column6: The Black Dahlias continues to take the law into their own hands, and it's up to the Order to shut them down - even if some team members agree with their purpose. And what does the M.A.N. from S.H.A.D.O.W. want with former Order members?
column8: | writer:Matt Fraction | penciller (cover):Barry Kitson | letterer:Dave Lanphear | inker:Mark Morales | colorist:Dean White
